Hello! My name is Jishnu Veerapaneni, I am an undergraduate at UIC studying neuroscience. My Github account is https://github.com/jishnuvee and my email is jishnuvee2035@gmail.com, please feel free to contact me if you havee any other questions or comments! 

This project explores a brain stroke dataset to identify and visualize key factors—such as age, hypertension, heart disease, and lifestyle habits—that may be associated with the occurrence of strokes. Github repo: https://github.com/jishnuvee/brain-stroke 

This project was created as a part of Kane's Data Science Bootcamp https://bootcamp.davidkane.info/
